sentences.en: a glorious chapter in our country's history
sentences.cn: 我国历史上光辉的一页

sentences.en: an inglorious chapter in the nation's history
sentences.cn: 这个民族历史上可耻的一页

sentences.en: For a discussion of biology and sexual politics, see chapter 4.
sentences.cn: 生态政治和性别政治论述请见第4章。

sentences.en: Our discussion in the previous chapter continues this line of thinking.
sentences.cn: 我们上一章的讨论延续了这一思路。
家庭作业是阅读第 11 章。

sentences.en: See Chapter 7 below for further comments on the textile industry.
sentences.cn: 有关纺织业的更多评论请参看下面第7章。

sentences.en: she can give chapter and verse on current legislation.
sentences.cn: 她能给出当前立法的精确典据。

sentences.en: The chapter is mostly wordy rhetoric.
sentences.cn: 这一章多为冗长的华丽词藻。

sentences.en: The results of the research are summarized at the end of the chapter.
sentences.cn: 在这一章末尾对研究结果作了总结。

sentences.en: There is a useful bibliography at the end of each chapter.
sentences.cn: 在每一章后附有一份有用的参考书目.

sentences.en: These ideas will be examined in more detail in Chapter 10.
sentences.cn: 这些观点将在第10章作更为详细的探讨。

sentences.en: This chapter discusses power, and how people use it.
sentences.cn: 这一章节讲权力，以及人们如何运用权力。

sentences.en: This chapter explores the linkage between economic development and the environment.
sentences.cn: 本章探讨的是经济发展与环境之间的关系。

sentences.en: This had been a particularly difficult chapter in Lebanon's recent history.
sentences.cn: 这在黎巴嫩的近代史上是个特别困难的时期。

sentences.en: This point is developed further at the end of this chapter.
sentences.cn: 这一点在本章结尾处有进一步阐释。

sentences.en: Uncle Richard intoned a chapter from the Bible and improvised a prayer.
sentences.cn: 理查德叔叔吟诵了《圣经》中的一章，又即兴作了一段祈祷文。

sentences.en: We saw in Chapter 16 how annual cash budgets are produced.
sentences.cn: 在第16章我们了解了年度现金预算是怎样制订的。

sentences.en: You will find all the particulars in Chapter 9.
sentences.cn: 你在第9章会找到所有细节。

trans.tran_en: one of the parts into which a book is divided
